Text:
does anyone have the 1958 movie? it was shown on TCM (supposedly)

also, there are other eps of the 1963 series, I know of two (Honor Ranch and Great Manhunt) , and therefore probably many more.
Loved this series as a kid... just wondering how you came up with your episode numbering, it doesn't match the wiki or imdb links you gave.
I tried to find the 1958 videos but was unable to find them. I have found what I could on the internet but if somebody else can find them I would be more than glad to grab them.
So many hit and runs, would be nice to see more seeders than me.
A fellow I know is stuck at 98% on this torrent, and he says others are as well.   Are you through seeding it?
This is absolutely fantastic. Thank you so much for posting.
